resources.string: A classic arcade game reimagined for play using HTC Dot View.

HTC Dot Breaker lets you play a modern take on classic, brick breaking arcade games using your HTC Dot View case. \nCan you crash into every dot and conquer all of the exciting levels? Challenge friends and family to see who can get the highest score! \nTo play, youâ€™ll need the HTC Dot View case and app.
